title: Pie Charts and Angles 1
question_text: This pie chart shows the favourite hobbies for a Year 6 class of 120 students. How many students voted for playing the guitar?
This pie chart shows the favourite hobbies for a Year 6 class of 120 students. How many students voted for playing on the computer?
This pie chart shows the favourite hobbies for a Year 6 class of 120 students. How many students voted for listening to music?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 6 class of 60 students. How many students voted for the dolphin?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 6 class of 60 students. How many students voted for the duck?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 6 class of 60 students. How many students voted for the goldfish?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 5 group of 80 students. How many students voted for the monkey?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 5 group of 80 students. How many students voted for the rabbit?
This pie chart shows the favourite animals for a Year 5 group of 80 students. How many students voted for the dog?
